pkgmetadata.longdescription: A 'ggplot2' and 'gganimate' Version of Pac-Man // A funny coding challenge to reproduce the game Pac-Man using 'ggplot2' and 'gganimate'. It provides a pre-defined moves set for Pac-Man and the ghosts for the first level of the game Pac-Man as well as polygon datasets to draw ghosts in 'ggplot2'.
